name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quizzy APP - AI Tutor for Exams

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture screenshot, and analyze your questions with Quizzy AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📚 Study smarter and save time with Quizzy – the ultimate Chrome extension for tackling MCQs, exams, and interview questions with ease! ✨

Powered by advanced AI 🤖, Quizzy provides instant, accurate answers to multiple-choice questions, helping students improve grades and ace exams effortlessly. Say goodbye to copy-pasting into other tools (ChatGPT 🤫) and struggling with complex formats – with Quizzy, simply take a screenshot, and let our AI do the work!

Why Choose Quizzy App?
− Instant Answers to Visual Questions: Quizzy handles more than just text – it’s built to interpret screenshots, complex images, and graphs, making it perfect for questions that require visual recognition. 🚀
− AI-Powered Efficiency: From simple text to detailed visuals, Quizzy’s AI provides accurate answers fast, saving you time and effort. ⏩
− Exam and Study Support: Whether you’re studying for exams or preparing for interviews, Quizzy supports you with reliable answers anytime. ⏳
− No More Copy-Pasting: Unlike traditional tools, Quizzy allows you to skip the hassle of manual input – just snap a picture and get the answer instantly. ✋

Join the Quizzy community today and unlock the power of AI for smarter, more productive studying. Try Quizzy for fast, reliable answers – no matter the format!
